project.name: ADK Tools Extended
project.description:
Extended tools that require external dependencies beyond JDK standard libraries.
Separation Criteria: This module contains tools that depend on third-party libraries such as Spring WebFlux (for HTTP), java-diff-utils (for patch), etc. Separating them from adk-tools keeps the core tool set lightweight and allows applications to opt-in to extended capabilities selectively.
Included tools: - GrepTool : Regex search in files - StrReplaceFileTool: String replacement editing (requires approval) - PatchFileTool : Apply unified diff patches (depends on java-diff-utils) - FetchURLTool : Fetch web page content (depends on Spring WebFlux) - WebSearchTool : Web search capability (depends on Spring WebFlux) - SetTodoListTool : Todo list management - AskHumanTool : Human-in-the-loop interaction - TaskTool : Sub-agent task delegation - MetaTool : Meta-programming via JShell
External dependencies: spring-webflux, reactor-netty-http, java-diff-utils
